position.marginalia_text: What man[ner] of evell [that] eu[er] thow be / on goddys behalfe I co[n]iure the / I co[n]iure the with the blessyd crosse that Jhc was done one with fforse / I co[n]iure the with the nayls this thre [that] Jhc was done apon the tre / I co[n]iure the with the crowne of thorne [that] on heyd was done ffor skorne / I co[n]iure the with the blessyd bloode that Jhc bleyd on the Rode / I co[n]iure the with the wounds ffyve [that] Jhc suffurt in his lyve I co[n]iure the with the wyolye spere [that] [longins?] tyll his hart can bere / yet I co[n]iure the now the lasse with all the vertues of the masse / in honore [?] marie et [?] batolphi et s[an]cte apolonie et sancte petronille et [?] [per?] [?] et [?]
